about_the_game:
Hello, devs Melos and Marina here. We made Angeline Era, an unforgettable and wild Bumpslash Action-Adventure! Today, we'd like our characters to introduce the game:

Bumpslash is easy... but don't get cocky!

TETS: I’ve spent many years practicing the Art of Bumpslash — just bump me into enemies to automatically attack! (Fans of Ys, take note!) It's fast-paced, and you’ll pick it up in no time!

PRINCESS NIAMH: HAHAHAHA!! Tets, my dear... aren’t you giving them false hope? After all, the Fae spirit “Melos” has prepared many vicious and hilarious tricks to guard our ancient secrets! My heart swells thinking of the suffering that awaits these unsuspecting players!

A vast world, brimming with secrets!

ANGEL ARKAS: Don’t forget the bigger picture: a vast world map you can search to find levels and zones. Follow your instincts to chart a flexible path. Go at your own pace — follow your spirit! Life's not a checklist, it’s an experience!!

A woven myth... arcane and emotional!

TETS: Agreed! I can’t wait to escape into this world’s haunting lore, woven from Irish mythology, early Christian philosophy, and Japanese American history. By poring over ancient texts and researching on-location, Melos and Marina have grounded their world in truth!

ANGEL ARKAS: Truth is not limited to dusty details, Tets. You've forgotten about Angeline Era's tales of fruitless yearning, life-shattering betrayal and unsettling beauty! Only the truths of the heart will bring forth the future...

PRINCESS NIAMH: What on earth are you two going on about? This is an action game. KILL, KILL!!

Features

  • Lots of levels with bosses and a story

  • Fast-paced action levels AND exploration-and-lore focused levels

  • Mix it up with subweapons and a gun!

  • Visit towns to shop for items

  • Explore a nonlinear world at your own pace

  • Replayable, 8-12 hour single-player experience

  • Low-difficulty setting for Beginner Bumpslashers, and nightmarish settings for the deranged

  • From Anodyne 2 and Sephonie's devs, Melos and Marina!
detailed_description:
Hello, devs Melos and Marina here. We made Angeline Era, an unforgettable and wild Bumpslash Action-Adventure! Today, we'd like our characters to introduce the game:

Bumpslash is easy... but don't get cocky!

TETS: I’ve spent many years practicing the Art of Bumpslash — just bump me into enemies to automatically attack! (Fans of Ys, take note!) It's fast-paced, and you’ll pick it up in no time!

PRINCESS NIAMH: HAHAHAHA!! Tets, my dear... aren’t you giving them false hope? After all, the Fae spirit “Melos” has prepared many vicious and hilarious tricks to guard our ancient secrets! My heart swells thinking of the suffering that awaits these unsuspecting players!

A vast world, brimming with secrets!

ANGEL ARKAS: Don’t forget the bigger picture: a vast world map you can search to find levels and zones. Follow your instincts to chart a flexible path. Go at your own pace — follow your spirit! Life's not a checklist, it’s an experience!!

A woven myth... arcane and emotional!

TETS: Agreed! I can’t wait to escape into this world’s haunting lore, woven from Irish mythology, early Christian philosophy, and Japanese American history. By poring over ancient texts and researching on-location, Melos and Marina have grounded their world in truth!

ANGEL ARKAS: Truth is not limited to dusty details, Tets. You've forgotten about Angeline Era's tales of fruitless yearning, life-shattering betrayal and unsettling beauty! Only the truths of the heart will bring forth the future...

PRINCESS NIAMH: What on earth are you two going on about? This is an action game. KILL, KILL!!

Features

  • Lots of levels with bosses and a story

  • Fast-paced action levels AND exploration-and-lore focused levels

  • Mix it up with subweapons and a gun!

  • Visit towns to shop for items

  • Explore a nonlinear world at your own pace

  • Replayable, 8-12 hour single-player experience

  • Low-difficulty setting for Beginner Bumpslashers, and nightmarish settings for the deranged

  • From Anodyne 2 and Sephonie's devs, Melos and Marina!
legal_notice: Angeline Era is a pending trademark of Analgesic Productions, a USA LLC.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any MacOS in the Past 3 Years
  • Processor: 64-bit + Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything around 2018 Macbook Pro
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS MUST be within past 3 years
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any MacOS in the Past 3 Years
  • Processor: 64-bit + Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything around 2020 Macbook Pro
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: macOS MUST be within past 3 years

name: Angeline Era

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (May not work in all cases)
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 610M (mid-tier 2012 laptop)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No customer support for win7/8.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 Mobile Max-Q (Mid-tier 2019 gaming laptop)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews:
“All the levels are very bite-sized, and they throw all these interesting enemy variations and patterns at you. It's very colorful - love the art style, music, secrets, and the boss fights were very creative and fun!”
Iron Pineapple
short_description: An unforgettable and wild Bumpslash Action-Adventure! Explore a world of Fae, Humans and Angels, where hilarious hazards and charming creatures await. Will you uncover its mysteries?

support_info.email: See our studio website (this field is often scraped by bots)

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
